stglib.iq.read_iq

stglib.iq.read_iq(filnam)

Read SonTek IQ data which has been exported as a Matlab .mat file from IQ software into an xarray Dataset

Parameters

filnam (string) – The SonTek .mat filename

Returns

An xarray Dataset of the IQ data

Return type

xarray.Dataset
